tool.name: iBridges upload to iRODS
tool.description: uploads files to an iRODS instance
tool.command: #import json #set $files = [] #for $i in $range(len($local_collection.keys())) #silent $files.append(($local_collection[$i].false_path, $local_collection[$i].name)) #end for #silent f=open($__tool_directory__+"/files_to_upload.json", 'w') #silent json.dump($files, f) python '$__tool_directory__/ibridges_upload.py' --irods_path '$irods_path' --uploads_file '$__tool_directory__/files_to_upload.json' $overwrite_flag
tool.help:
**Tool for uploading files from a Galaxy collection into an iRODS folder**
+ Choose the Galaxy collection to upload, and specify the iRODS path to the target folder (collection).
+ If your files are not in a collection yet, manually create a collection first.
+ If you do not know the exact iRODS path, you can use the 'iBridges browser for iRODS' interactive tool to obtain the correct path.
